description:
Create Fixed Product with interest rate chart and with a incentive. 
Click on submit  
Click on edit fd product, 
In the modification fd page, click on incentive button. 
Add new incentive button is not available. 
Expected:-   
Add new incentive button should be available on the modification page.
name: Mifos X Web App - Modify Fixed Deposit Product - Add Button For Adding New Incentive Is Not Available
